text: Joel Carver Whitburn (November 29, 1939 - June 14, 2022) was an American author and music historian. He was born in Wauwatosa, Wisconsin. He was known for his work with Billboard. Whitburn died on June 14, 2022 at the age of 82.Andrew Unterberger, "Joel Whitburn, Legendary Chart Historian and Reference Book Author, Dies at 82", Billboard, June 14, 2022. Retrieved June 15, 2022 ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American historians Category:Writers from Wisconsin
title: Joel Whitburn
